code: import axios from'axios';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import API_BASE_URL from'../config.js';const useUserCodService=()=>{const{token}=useAuth();const getUserCods=async()=>{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/user-cods/"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;};return{getUserCods};};export default useUserCodService;
